adlpqsp: ADCS ADL-Prevention Questionnaire for Study Partner

Source: R/data.R
adlpqsp.Rd

ATRI clinical analysis dataset.

Usage

data(adlpqsp)

Format

A data frame with 15523 rows and 88 variables.

Details

  • SUBSTUDY: NA

  • BID: NA

  • VISCODE: NA

  • DONE: Was assessment/procedure done?

  • NDREASON: If No, reason not done:

  • AIMETHOD: Method of Collection:

  • BPID: Study Partner ID:

  • AICBOOK: 1. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} balance a credit card statement, pay bills, or use an ATM to make a withdrawal or deposit?

  • AISUB1A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB1B: NA

  • AISUB1C: NA

  • AITRAVL: 2. In the past 3 months, did {P} drive a car without getting lost, or travel to wherever he/she needed to go by using public or other transport?

  • AISUB2A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB2B: NA

  • AISUB2C: NA

  • AIAPPLI: 3. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} use an appliance (for example, a microwave, dishwasher, vacuum cleaner, or TV remote), or carry out household repairs?

  • AISUB3A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB3B: NA

  • AISUB3C: NA

  • AILAUN: 4. In the past 3 months, did {P} clean a load of laundry?

  • AISUB4A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB4B: NA

  • AISUB4C: NA

  • AIPAY: 5. In the past 3 months, did {P} select and pay for items when shopping?

  • AISUB5A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB5B: NA

  • AISUB5C: NA

  • AISNACK: 6. In the past 3 months, did {P} prepare a meal or snack?

  • AISUB6A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB6B: NA

  • AISUB6C: NA

  • AITIMES: 7. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} remember important dates and times, such as appointments or meetings?

  • AISUB7A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB7B: NA

  • AISUB7C: NA

  • AIFIND: 8. In the past 3 months, did {P} usually manage to find personal belongings at home - for example keys, glasses, a wallet or books?

  • AISUB8A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB8B: NA

  • AISUB8C: NA

  • AIWDOWN: 9. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} write things down, for example letters or detailed notes or lists, so that other people understood them?

  • AISUB9A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB9B: NA

  • AISUB9C: NA

  • AIMOVIE: 10. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} follow TV programs or movies and remember the details of the story?

  • AISUB10A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB10B: NA

  • AICEVNT: 11. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} talk about and remember current events that he/she heard or read about?

  • AISUB11A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB11B: NA

  • AIPHONE: 12. In the past 3 months, how well did {P} make telephone calls, including looking up numbers or calling directory assistance if necessary?

  • AISUB12A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB12B: NA

  • AISUB12C: NA

  • AIMEDS: 13. In the past 3 months, did {P} take medications regularly - including prescription or over the counter medications?

  • AISUB13A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB13B: NA

  • AIPLAN: 14. In the past 3 months, did {P} plan and organize complex activities for him/herself or for groups of people, for example travel, running errands, participating in group activities (such as religious services), or carrying out hobbies or pastimes?

  • AISUB14A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB14B: NA

  • AISUB14C: NA

  • AICOMPL: 15. In the past 3 months, did {P} complete complex activities such as hobbies or pastimes, for example playing card games, reading books, gardening?

  • AISUB15A: If with some difficulty:

  • AISUB15B: NA

  • AISUB15C: NA

  • AICELL: 16. Did {P} ever use a cellphone or smartphone?

  • AICELLUSE: 16a. If yes, during the past 3 months, did {P} use a cellphone or smartphone?

  • AICALL: 16b.i. Make a call:

  • AITEXT: 16b.ii. Send a text message:

  • AIINTER: 16b.iii. Access the internet (e.g., websites, Facebook, etc):

  • AIAPP: 16b.iv. Use an App (including playing a game):

  • AICELLOFTN: 16c. Did {P} use a cellphone or smartphone less often than usual?

  • AICELITDIF: 16d. Did {P} use a cellphone or smartphone:

  • AICOMP: 17. Did {P} ever use a computer, tablet, or other device with internet access?

  • AIACCESS: 17a. If yes, during the past 3 months, did {P} use a computer, tablet, or other device with internet access?

  • AIWEB: 17b.i. Access websites, Facebook, or email:

  • AIINFO: 17b.ii. Enter information on the device, e.g, made bookmarks, wrote and sent emails, posted on Facebook, etc:

  • AIPURCH: 17b.iii. Make purchases or reservations:

  • AIPASS: 17b.iv. Use passwords and remember or find them on his/her own:

  • AICOMPOFTN: 17c. Did {P} use a computer, tablet, or other device with internet access less often than usual?

  • AICLITDIF: 17d. Did {P} use a computer, tablet, or other device with internet access:

  • AIEREAD: 18. Did {P} ever use an e-reader, e.g. Nook, Kindle or a tablet?

  • AIEREAD4: 18a. If yes, during the past 3 months, did {P} use an e-reader, e.g. Nook, Kindle or a tablet?

  • AIEBOOK: 18b.i. Read a book or article:

  • AIEDLOAD: 18b.ii. Download reading material:

  • AIEADJUST: 18b.iii. Make an adjustment to appearance e.g., inserted a bookmark or adjusted settings:

  • AIEOFTEN: 18c. Did {P} use an e-reader less often than usual?

  • AIELITDIF: 18d. Did {P} use an e-reader:

  • AISCORE: Total Score

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
browseVignettes('A4LEARN')
} # }
